description:
Sync or back up your folders on your Windows PC or Mac for easy access anytime, anywhere


Fixed issues
- Fixed an issue where the "Pause" button still appeared after a photo transfer was paused.
- Fixed an issue where BeeFiles sync folders might not be fully displayed when clicking the folder icon within BeeStation for desktop in the system tray.
- Fixed an issue where photos already backed up with the BeePhotos mobile app were backed up again when transferred from iCloud.
- Fixed an issue where photos in JPE or QT format transferred from iCloud were not placed in the correct album.
- Improved the connection mechanism to reduce connection failures in certain scenarios.
- Fixed an issue where transferring photos from Google Photos could fail due to abnormal archive formats or photo metadata errors.
